Articles.Content:
It's happened many times, not just on Kerbin but also on other planets, like Laythe. I thought those kind of problems were solved with 1.0 but I was wrong.

Just happened again, looking for an anomaly at the North Pole of Kerbin.

![v90UotB.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/v90UotB.jpg)

Ladders are dangerous or what?
